name: Lederhosen Sepp
description: Lederhosen Sepp is a 2D jump and run with the aim to get as far as possible, but there are obstacles such as opponents who want to kill you, which you can prevent by jumping on them and you can also die in abysses. In the map there are coins distributed which you can collect and use them to unlock new skins and items. You can also find beer which gives you a power up for 5 seconds. MA Company would be very happy if you download the game and give your honest opinion. In the future there will be updates with more skins, items and more wleten. If there are any problems, please write them in the comments.
